channel.title: Making npc's talk
channel.description: Hi, im a beginer coder and i wana know how to make npc's talk.... if you help me you code more ill give admin on server, and rep++ i also need help changing the name,cords,and player level use thing

item.title: Making npc's talk
item.dc:creator: @D_R_U_G D R U G
item.description:
@D_R_U_G wrote:

ok go to npc handler and look for

if (npcs.npcType == Put in NPC ID here) {
if (misc.random2(10) == 3) {
npcs.updateRequired = true;
npcs.textUpdateRequired = true;
npcs.textUpdate = “Put in here what the npc should say.”;
}
}

for colors:
@whi@(text)@whi@
@red@(text)@red@

stuff like that

Read full topic

item.title: Making npc's talk
item.dc:creator: @zilchuary zilchuary
item.description:
@zilchuary wrote:

look for

moo

then under the
}
put
if (npcs[i].npcType == Put in NPC ID here) {
if (misc.random2(10) == 3) {
npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdate = “Put in here what the npc should say.”;
}
}

item.title: Making npc's talk
item.dc:creator: @barragey0uXD barragey0uXD
item.description:
@barragey0uXD wrote:

if (npcs[i].npcType == Put in NPC ID here) { if (misc.random2(10) == 3) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "Put in here what the npc should say."; } }
